title: Child shot at local apartment complex
content:
MERIDIAN, Miss. (WTOK) -- Meridian police are investigating a shooting overnight at an apartment complex where a child was shot.
MPD responded to Western Gardens where that incident took place.
Sergeant Dareall Thompson says a 1-month old infant was airlifted to Jackson.
Thompson says the shooting appears to be accidental, but two people were taken into custody.
We'll bring you more information as soon as we get it.
